physical_examinations.vital_signs: Weight: 2.25 kg, Length: 40 cm, Occipito-frontal circumference: 31.5 cm
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dolichocephalic skull with a receding forehead. Low set ears with prominent antihelices. Narrow and slightly upslanting palpebral fissures, proud and prominent nose, almost no glabellar angle, micrognathia, microstomia with a high arched palate, and a short neck. Both testicles were descended. Long hands with narrow fingers and hyperconvex nails. Clenched fingers with second and fifth fingers overlapping third and fourth. Limited abduction at hips and extension at knees. Rocker bottom feet with clinodactyly of the fourth and fifth toes on both sides. Hypotonic with absent neonatal reflexes.
